title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 12, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 12, 2020
description:
On today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the NBA Finals and Week 5 in the NFL. Where does this championship put Lebron amongst the all time greats? Where does Dak's injury put the Cowboys in the NFC East? We're joined by Sports Illustrated's Chris Mannix and ESPN's Ed Werder. Plus, Dan remembers Joe Morgan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
